title: CentOS Security Update for kernel (CESA-2018:1629)
solution:
To resolve this issue, upgrade to the latest packages which contain a patch. Refer to CentOS advisory centos 7 for updates and patch information.
Patch:
Following are links for downloading patches to fix the vulnerabilities:
 CESA-2018:1629: centos 7
summary: CentOS has released security update for kernel security update to fix the vulnerabilities.Affected Products:centos 7 Successful exploitation allows attacker an unprivileged attacker to use this flaw to read privileged memory by conducting targeted cache side-channel attacks.
